item.title: The Old World
The Old Obsolete
item.description: My current predicament is simply the old habbit, the old pattren that occasionaly arise to the surface of my conciousness while Im off guard. As experience has taugth me that man cannot delete his own memories intentionally. All action that you did is written within your being. Beware my friend, there is no enemies other than yourself. And you are not yourself! â€“ Hey you know what, I think this is the time.

item.title: Combustion Residue
item.description: Where? Where is my unflinching scrutiny when I need it? It’s like my ultimate weapon is gone when the time comes. Just as Karna in Kurukshetra. – Confession God forgive me for wasting this opportunity And deny the possibility. Forgive me for being such a fool. For being full of belief and opinions. For lived as a mere pleasure seeker. For I was ignorant and lived within the mind. Peace and freedom is nowhere to be found
